title: Can we pray on the Stairs (staircase) due to lack of space in the masjid? #Assim assim al hakeem
transcript: sh during jum prayer when the mjid gets uh filled to capacity uh there are people who pray on the staircase because of lack of space so is this permissible as long as they can stand properly facing the and when they prostrate make sujud they can make sujud on their seven limbs this is permissible inshallah
